title: PESSAT Momint
content:
Was I the only one who didn't know that there might be numerical-type questions in PESSAT?

As I was sitting there in front of the computer and saw the question with a mini keyboard and with no options my cranial capacity to generate a thought became minimal and all my neurons deactivated in an instant.

comments.body:
well i didn't know until i saw this post  
how did the rest of the exam go?
In my shift (28th Morning) , they even asked fill in the blanks wherein we had to "type" the answer and it wasn't MCQ.

the ones who wrote before didn't tell me anything shm ðŸ—¿...English had fill in the blanks and asked the synonyms of words I've never heard before..Maths doable but lengthy..physics mid as always..chemistry weird( random ahh chapters)
ah man mine is tomorrow and i dont know shit
Mb , but there were only 3-4 questions that way.
Was it only me or was the English part super fucking hard????

all the best man  
what's your shift?
yeah english was mad hard.. i had never even seen those words in ma life holy shit
Fr mfs thinking I've done my masters in English literature

one of the answers required a space between words but my virtual keyboard didn't even have a space option and the invigilator didn't know what to do

there was no info on till what decimal place the answer has to be entered

yes every other english exam is so easy

idt any person ever has used such words
